- CommentLike ( Model )

 properties: 
    like_user
    comment
    created_at
    updated_at

- UserFollow ( Model )

 Properties:
    follower
    following
    created_at
    updated_at

- Video/Create ( ViewSet )
    * upload the video from request post data ( filename is autogenerated for unique )
    * Create Video Instance with uploaded file name
    * Return Video Instance Id

- Video/Edit ( ViewSet )
    * remove original video file
    * upload the video from request post data ( filename is previous name )
    * Update Video Instance with updated data
    * return status code and Video Instance Id

- Social Share(?)

- Notifications ( Model, Viewset-?)
 What the types of notifications?
 What can be notifications?

 - Reminder(?)
